languages.text: "Хозяева этого места заслужили такой почет? Они — избранные слуги Неумирающего?.. Или они восславляют себя, а не Его?"
languages.translation_comment: Argenta: "Indeed. I have not seen many places that flaunt such luxury. If you were to scrape all the gilding from every temple on Footfall, it would still be less than there is here."

languages.text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"
languages.original_text: "Хозяева этого места заслужили такой почет? Они — избранные слуги Неумирающего?.. Или они восславляют себя, а не Его?"

traits.locale_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"
"Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"
"Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"
"Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"
"Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

languages.text: "Verdienen die hiesigen Meister eine solche Ehre? Sind sie die Auserwählten Diener des Todlosen? Oder verherrlichen sie sich selbst statt ihn?"
languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

traits.locale_text: "Verdienen die hiesigen Meister eine solche Ehre? Sind sie die Auserwählten Diener des Todlosen? Oder verherrlichen sie sich selbst statt ihn?"

languages.text: « Les maîtres de céans méritent-ils tant d'honneurs ? Sont-ils les serviteurs élus de l'Immortel ou ne rendent-ils gloire qu'à eux-mêmes ? »
languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

traits.locale_text: « Les maîtres de céans méritent-ils tant d'honneurs ? Sont-ils les serviteurs élus de l'Immortel ou ne rendent-ils gloire qu'à eux-mêmes ? »

languages.text: «¿Merecen los maestros de este palacio semejante honor? ¿Son los sirvientes del Inmortal, o acaso se glorifican a sí mismos por encima de Él?».
languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Merecen los maestros de este palacio semejante honor? ¿Son los sirvientes del Inmortal, o acaso se glorifican a sí mismos por encima de Él?».

languages.text: 「ここの主人たちはそのような栄誉に値するのか？彼らは不死の者に選ばれた下僕なのか？それとも、彼よりも自分たちを讃えているのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

traits.locale_text: 「ここの主人たちはそのような栄誉に値するのか？彼らは不死の者に選ばれた下僕なのか？それとも、彼よりも自分たちを讃えているのだろうか？」

languages.text: “这个地方的主人真的配得上这样的荣耀吗？那个人是不死之神亲自选中的仆人吗？还是说，那个人认为自己比不死之神更应荣耀加身？”
languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

traits.locale_text: “这个地方的主人真的配得上这样的荣耀吗？那个人是不死之神亲自选中的仆人吗？还是说，那个人认为自己比不死之神更应荣耀加身？”

languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"

languages.text: "Buranın sahipleri böylesi bir onuru hak ediyorlar mı? Bu kişiler, Ölmeyen'in seçilmiş hizmetkârları mı? Yoksa kendilerini O'ndan daha mı yüce görüyorlar?"
languages.original_text: "Do the masters of this place deserve such honour? Are they the chosen servants of the Undying One? Or do they glorify themselves rather than Him?"
